ARABIC: ءَآلْـَٰٔنَ وَقَدْ عَصَيْتَ قَبْلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'What, now! When previously you rebelled and were one of the corrupters?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yes, now" (was the answer), "though before this you were disobedient and rebellious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Thereupon came the response): 'Now you believe, although you disobeyed earlier and were one of the mischief-makers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (God replied), "Now you declare belief in Me! but before this you were a disobedient rebel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “What! Now?* Whereas you were disobedient from the start and you were mischievous!” (This was said to Firaun.* Accepting faith at the time of death is of no use.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Now (you believe) while you refused to believe before and you were one of the mischief-makers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! now! and indeed you disobeyed before and you were of the mischief-makers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Now? And before thou didst rebel, being of those that did corruption.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: What! Now! When hitherto thou hast rebelled and been of the wrong-doers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Only now? When you had always been a rebel, and a wrongdoer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Now indeed! whereas thou hast rebelled afore, and wast of the corrupters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [He was told,] ‘What! Now? When you have been disobedient heretofore and were among the agents of corruption?!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (It was said to him): "Ah now!- But a little while before, wast thou in rebellion!- and thou didst mischief (and violence)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Now (you believe) while you refused to believe before and you were one of the Mufsidun (evil-doers, corrupts, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Allah said): 'Now (you believe)! But before this you rebelled and were of the corrupt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Now? When you have rebelled before, and been of the mischief-makers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Now? And you had disobeyed [Him] before and were of the corrupters?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:91] ‘Now, do you believe, when hitherto you have disobeyed and been of those who do corruption?, on account of your being astray and your leading [others] astray, away from belief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: The Archangel Gabriel said to him: (What! Now!) will you believe now upon drowning (When hitherto) before this drowning (thou hast rebelled) disbelieved in Allah (and been of the wrong-doers) in the land of Egypt, killing, associating partners with Allah and calling for the worship of other than Allah?
